title: Hand-Drawn Cartoon Smoke
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Hand-Drawn Cartoon Smoke elements!

This package contains 10 Hand-Drawn Cartoon Smoke sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/DDLgnoja7-g


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Smoke 01_#[512,288] 2048 × 1440

● Smoke 02_#[512,288] 2048 × 1152

● Smoke 03_#[512,288] 2560 × 1440

● Smoke 04_#[512,288] 2048 × 1728

● Smoke 05_#[512,288] 2560 × 1440

● Smoke 06_#[512,288] 2560 × 1728

● Smoke 07_#[512,288] 1536 × 1440

● Smoke 08_#[512,288] 2560 × 1440

● Smoke 09_#[512,288] 2560 × 2016

● Smoke 10_#[512,288] 2560 × 1440


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
